Escalation: Before Exploring, on each board, add 1 Town to a land without a Town.
Before Exploring, on each board, build in the land with the most Towns/Cities (minimum one).
After Exploring, on each board, pick a land of the shown terrain. If it has a Town/City, add 1 Blight. Otherwise, add 1 Town.
After Exploring, on each board with 4 or fewer Blight, add 1 Town to a land without Towns/Blight. On each board with 2 or fewer Blight, do so again.
After Advancing Invader Cards, on each board, Explore in 2 lands whose terrains don't match a Ravage or Build Card.
